title: Depression-Era Photos Make A Mark In American Photography
teaser: A Yale University project has organized and mapped photographs taken for the Farm Security Administration and Office of War Information from 1935 to 1946. Now there's an online tool to explore them.
contentencoded:
A Yale University project has organized and mapped photographs taken for the Farm Security Administration and Office of War Information from 1935 to 1946. Now there's an online tool to explore them. This piece originally aired on Morning Edition on Sept. 2, 2014.

Copyright 2015 NPR. To see more, visit http://www.npr.org/.
